clinical_study.brief_title: 10 Year Registry of Children (Ages 2-17 Years) With Eczema That Have Used Pimecrolimus
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective 10 Year Observational Registry of Pediatric Subjects (Age Greater Than or Equal to Two Years to Age Less Than or Equal to 17 Years) With Atopic Dermatitis Who Have Used Elidel Cream 1% (Pimecrolimus)

collaborator.agency: Clinical Research Computing Unit (University of Pennsylvania)

brief_summary.textblock: This study will examine the risk of systemic malignancies in pediatric patients with atopic dermatitis exposed to Elidel 1% cream.

detailed_description.textblock: Registry study to examine the risk of systemic malignancies in pediatric patients with atopic dermatitis exposed to Elidel 1% cream.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence rate of systemic malignancies in pediatric subjects with atopic dermatitis who have been exposed to pimecrolimus 1% cream
primary_outcome.time_frame: 10 years of observation with 6-month reporting intervals

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence rate of lymphoma in pediatric subjects with atopic dermatitis who have been exposed to pimecrolimus 1% cream
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 years of observation with 6-month reporting intervals

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence rate of thyroid cancer in pediatric subjects with atopic dermatitis who have been exposed to pimecrolimus 1% cream
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 years of observation with 6-month reporting intervals

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence rate of cutaneous malignancy in pediatric subjects with atopic dermatitis who have been exposed to pimecrolimus 1% cream
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 years of observation with 6-month reporting intervals

arm_group.description: Single-group Open Label Registry of patients exposed to Elidel/Pimecrolimus

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- males and females
- greater than or equal to 2 years and less than or equal to 17 years at enrollment
- diagnosis of atopic dermatitis (confirmed by treating physician)
- applied pimecrolimus cream 1 % 6 weeks out of past 24 weeks
Exclusion Criteria:
- past or present history of systemic malignancy, skin malignancy, or lymphoproliferative disease
- past or present use of oral immunosuppressive therapy
